post:
Haven't posted here in a while, but I have some amazing deals for the LET community. We recently began deploying newer-generation hardware including Ryzen 3950X, 3900X, and Intel Core i9-10900K dedicated servers, so I have tons of old hardware I'm willing to let go at dirt cheap rates. All deals are only available while supplies last!

Nexril offers premium quality, DDoS-protected hosting services at affordable prices. Our dedicated server lineup offers unparalleled performance at the lowest prices in the market!

<hr>

All of our dedicated servers come with the following features:

* 30TB Premium Bandwidth @ 1Gbps Port Speed
* /29 IPv4 (5 Usable) + /48 IPv6 Allocation
* Control panel with remote reboot, bandwidth monitoring, automated rDNS management, and IP RTBH
* IPMI Access behind a secure OOB VPN gateway
* FREE BGP Sessions and IP announcements

**L5640-48**: [**$49/month**](https://nexril.net/dedicated/48gb-dual-intel-xeon-l5640-12-cores-24-threads.29?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=thread)

* 2x Intel Xeon L5640 Processors (2.80GHz, 12c / 24t)
* 48GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250GB HDD Base Drive


**1270v3-32**: [**$49/month**](https://nexril.net/dedicated/32gb-intel-xeon-e3-1270v3-4-cores-8-threads.76?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=thread) (!! Extended Setup Times !!)

* Intel Xeon E3-1270v3 Processor (3.50GHz, 4c / 8t)
* 32GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250GB SSD Base Drive


**1650v2-128**: [~~$99/month~~ **$84/month** with promo code LET84](https://nexril.net/dedicated/128gb-intel-xeon-e5-1650v2-6-cores-12-threads.55?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=thread)

* Intel Xeon E5-1650v2 Processor (3.50GHz, 6c / 12t)
* 128GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250GB SSD Base Drive


**2670-128**: [~~$99/month~~ **$84/month** with promo code LET84](https://nexril.net/dedicated/128gb-dual-intel-xeon-e5-2670-16-cores-32-threads.28?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=thread)

* 2x Intel Xeon E5-2670 Processor (2.60GHz, 16c / 32t)
* 128GB DDR3 ECC Memory
* 250GB SSD Base Drive


**7700K-64**: [~~$99/month~~ **$84/month** with promo code LET84](https://nexril.net/dedicated/64gb-intel-core-i7-7700k-4-cores-8-threads.64?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=thread)

* Intel Core i7-7700K Processor (4.20GHz, 4c / 8t)
* 64GB DDR4 Memory
* 250GB SSD Base Drive

<hr>

**Network**

We operate our own multihomed, BGP-optimized network ([AS13830](https://bgp.he.net/AS13830)) only on fully-owned, enterprise-grade Cisco networking equipment to offer the best performance and routing for our customers.

Network Looking Glass: https://lg.nexril.net/
Test IPv4: 161.129.152.2
Test IPv6: 2604:fbc0:1:1::
